weddingDetails.title: Wedding Details
weddingDetails.subtitle: Everything you need to know for our special day
weddingDetails.blackTieEleganceDescription: An evening to embrace timeless sophistication
weddingDetails.yourPaletteYourStyleDescription: No color restrictions ‚Äî wear what makes you feel the best
weddingDetails.winterCharmDescription: An elegant evening celebration ‚Äì feel free to wear what makes you comfortable
weddingDetails.transportationInfo: Transportation information will be shared with invited guests closer to the wedding date.
weddingDetails.gettingToDesc1: is easily accessible via Fiumicino (FCO) and Ciampino (CIA) airports. We recommend booking accommodations in central
weddingDetails.gettingToDesc2: for easy access to the venue.
weddingDetails.localTransportationDesc: has excellent public transportation including metro, buses, and taxis. Detailed directions will be provided with your invitation.
weddingDetails.sharePhotosDescription: Capture and share your favorite moments from our special day! Scan the QR code or click the button to access our wedding photo sharing app.

accommodations.title: Accommodations
accommodations.descriptionPart1: We're delighted you'll be celebrating with us in
accommodations.descriptionPart2: . Below are our recommended places to stay near our venue. We've reserved a special rate at our main hotel, plus curated options in three elegant tiers to suit different styles and budgets.
accommodations.ourMainHotelDescription: Note: The venue sits on Monte Mario, about ~3 km from the Vatican and ~5‚Äì7 km from the historic center; the hotel also runs a shuttle to Via Veneto on a set timetable. Please check the schedule directly with the hotel.
accommodations.recommendedHotelsDescription: These hotels will have special block rates for our guests (details coming soon).
accommodations.recommendedHotelsDetailsText: Full details and booking information will be available soon!
accommodations.signatureStaysDescription: Refined icons with postcard views and beautiful service.
accommodations.timelessTownAndCountryDescription: Chic addresses with character and great locations.
accommodations.taxiDescription: Fastest and simplest from anywhere in the center (typically ~10‚Äì20 minutes depending on traffic).
accommodations.metro: Metro A to Cipro + short taxi/bus
accommodations.metroDescription: From many central hotels near Spagna/Barberini/Flaminio you can ride Metro A toward Battistini and connect near Cipro for a short hop.
accommodations.hotelShuttleDescription: Seasonal timetable with pick-up/drop-off near Via Veneto; confirm times directly with the hotel.
accommodations.smallPrintDescription: Distances are approximate road distances from each hotel to the venue to help with planning; traffic can significantly affect travel time. For precise navigation on the day, we'll share exact pins and an arrival note closer to the wedding.

touristyThings.title: Touristy Things in
touristyThings.subtitlePart1: Here are some wonderful places to explore while in
touristyThings.subtitlePart2: . From ancient wonders to romantic spots, delicious cuisine to peaceful escapes ‚Äì make the most of your time in the Eternal City!
touristyThings.subtitle: Explore the area during your visit

contactFAQs.title: Contact & FAQs
contactFAQs.subtitle: Get in touch or find answers to common questions
contactFAQs.weddingPartyDescription: For questions about accommodations, transportation, or other wedding details, please don't hesitate to reach out to us directly.
contactFAQs.footerMessagePart1: Thank you for sharing our special day with us üíï
contactFAQs.footerMessagePart2: We can't wait to celebrate love, laughter, and happily ever after with all of you!

attire.question: What should I wear to the wedding?
attire.answer: We're embracing Elegant Evening wear for our special evening ‚Äî think timeless sophistication! The best part? There are no color restrictions ‚Äî wear whatever makes you feel amazing (we just kindly ask that guests avoid wearing white).

children.question: Are children welcome at the wedding?
children.answer: We love your little ones, but due to space and formality of the event, our wedding will be an adults-only celebration.

endTime.question: What time does the celebration end?
endTime.answer: It will never end! The ceremony beings at 6:30 pm, followed by henna party and dinner. Live music and dancing will follow after that and carry on as well as some late night bites!

photos.question: Can I take photos during the ceremony?
photos.answer: Of course you can! Take as many pictures as you want and you can upload them here: link coming soon

parking.question: Is there parking available at the venue?

dietary.question: What if I have dietary restrictions?
dietary.answer: Please let us know about any dietary restrictions or allergies when you RSVP. We'll work with our caterers to accommodate vegetarian, vegan, gluten-free, and other dietary needs.

weather.question: What's the weather like in Rome in December?
weather.answer: Please make sure to check our weather widget on the main page for the weather. December in Rome is mild but can be cool especially in the evenings. We recommend bringing cozy coats if you plan to go outside on the balcony.

gifts.question: Do you have a gift registry?
gifts.answer: Your presence at our wedding is the greatest gift of all! However, if you wish to honor us with a gift, we've created a registry on Etsy. You can find it in the [Gift Registry](/gift-registry) section of this website.

travel.question: How do I get to Rome and where should I stay?

footer.message: We can't wait to celebrate with you in

mainHotel.name: Rome Cavalieri, A Waldorf Astoria Hotel (Wedding Venue & Primary Stay)
mainHotel.notes: Resort-style oasis above the city, panoramic views, classic Roman grandeur.
mainHotel.transportNotes: Hotel shuttle to Via Veneto (seasonal/timetabled), taxis readily available.

hotelDeRussie.name: Hotel de Russie ‚Äî Rocco Forte
hotelDeRussie.transportNotes: Taxi (~15‚Äì20 min). Metro A (Flaminio ‚Üî Cipro) + short taxi.

hotelEden.name: Hotel Eden ‚Äî Dorchester Collection
hotelEden.transportNotes: Taxi; Metro A (Spagna/Barberini ‚Üî Cipro) + short taxi.

hasslerRoma.name: Hassler Roma
hasslerRoma.notes: A Roman icon with panoramic terraces.

bulgariHotel.name: Bulgari Hotel Roma
bulgariHotel.notes: Contemporary Italian opulence with a statement spa.
bulgariHotel.transportNotes: Taxi; Metro A (Spagna ‚Üî Cipro) + short taxi.

hotelDelaVille.name: Hotel de la Ville ‚Äî Rocco Forte

nhCollection.name: NH Collection Roma Giustiniano
nhCollection.notes: Wide rooms, easy walk to Castel Sant'Angelo & Via Cola di Rienzo.

hotelIsa.name: Hotel Isa
hotelIsa.notes: Boutique feel with a lovely rooftop terrace.
hotelIsa.transportNotes: Taxi; buses to Cavour/Prati; Metro A connections.

villaAgrippina.name: Villa Agrippina, Gran Meli√°
villaAgrippina.notes: Urban resort vibe between Vatican and Trastevere.
villaAgrippina.transportNotes: Taxi; buses via Gianicolo; Metro A (Ottaviano ‚Üî Cipro) + taxi.

martisPalace.name: Martis Palace Hotel
martisPalace.notes: Intimate design hotel steps from Rome's baroque heart.
martisPalace.transportNotes: Taxi; bus to Via Crescenzio then taxi.

palazzoNavona.name: Palazzo Navona Hotel
palazzoNavona.notes: Elegant minimalism with a stellar rooftop.
palazzoNavona.transportNotes: Taxi; bus links toward Prati then short taxi/walk.

hoxtonRome.name: The Hoxton, Rome
hoxtonRome.notes: Cool social spaces; leafy neighborhood vibes.

hotelSmeraldo.name: Hotel Smeraldo
hotelSmeraldo.transportNotes: Taxi; bus to Corso Vittorio Emanuele + short taxi/walk.

hotelSantAngelo.name: Hotel Sant'Angelo
hotelSantAngelo.transportNotes: Taxi; buses along Lungotevere & Via Cavour.

colosseum.name: Colosseum
colosseum.description: Ancient amphitheater and iconic symbol of Imperial Rome

romanForum.name: Roman Forum
romanForum.description: Ancient Roman public square with ruins of important government buildings
romanForum.tips: Visit early morning for fewer crowds

pantheon.name: Pantheon
pantheon.description: Remarkably preserved Roman temple with stunning dome

vatican.name: Vatican City & St. Peter's Basilica
vatican.description: The world's smallest country and magnificent basilica

treviFountain.name: Trevi Fountain
treviFountain.description: Baroque fountain perfect for making wishes together
treviFountain.tips: Visit at sunset or early morning for magical lighting

spanishSteps.name: Spanish Steps
spanishSteps.description: Beautiful stairway perfect for romantic photos
spanishSteps.tips: Climb to the top for great city views

villaBorghese.name: Villa Borghese Gardens
villaBorghese.description: Peaceful gardens perfect for romantic strolls
villaBorghese.tips: Rent bikes or have a picnic

castelSantAngelo.name: Castel Sant'Angelo
castelSantAngelo.description: Historic castle with panoramic views of Rome

trastevere.name: Trastevere District
trastevere.tips: Try carbonara and cacio e pepe

campoFiori.name: Campo de' Fiori Market
campoFiori.description: Morning market with fresh produce and local specialties
campoFiori.tips: Visit in the morning for the best selection

testaccio.name: Testaccio Food Tour
testaccio.description: Local food district with authentic Roman cuisine
testaccio.tips: Book a guided food tour for the best experience

giolitti.name: Gelato at Giolitti
giolitti.description: Historic gelateria serving Rome's finest gelato since 1900

tivoliVillaEste.name: Tivoli - Villa d'Este
tivoliVillaEste.description: Renaissance villa with stunning gardens and fountains
tivoliVillaEste.tips: Take the regional train from Rome

ostiaAntica.name: Ostia Antica
ostiaAntica.description: Ancient Roman port city with well-preserved ruins

castelGandolfo.name: Castel Gandolfo
castelGandolfo.description: Papal summer residence with beautiful lake views
castelGandolfo.tips: Perfect for a peaceful escape from the city

frascati.name: Frascati Wine Region
